pageContext.claim: “Former Senator Harry Reid (he got thrown out) is working hard to put a good spin on his failed career. He led through lies and deception, only to be replaced by another beauty, Cryin’ Chuck Schumer. Some things just never change!”
pageContext.analysis: Former Sen. Harry Reid retired from the Senate in 2017. He was not "thrown out" nor did he lose while running for another term in office. Reid served as a senator from Nevada for 34 years.
